name: ModiTweet
0:
”Alexa, open Modi Tweet”
”Alexa, ask Modi Tweet”
”Alexa, launch Modi Tweet”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: modi tweet
des:
Now, you can ask Alexa to give latest of India's prime minister Narendra Modi, by just saying "Alexa, open ModiTweet" and it will give you the latest tweet.

As of now, it only provide latest tweet but next version will give you more options like
1. Read next tweet
2. Read all tweet since date
3. Read again
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
